Articles.Content:
One day i was playing Minecraft with the Galacticraft mod on creative mode, so i could freebuild on other planets. after battling hundreds of glitches and bugs, and being incredibly frustrated by not being able to travel to Venus, i made a secret underground base on the moon.

Then i found out about the Build Faster mod, only after having broken my back one block at a time.

Then i found a strange emotion that made me hot and tense at everything, to this day i still feel it whenever i access the proper RNA sequence in order to view said event in what is known as the largest cluster of neurons in the human body.

Edited November 19, 2014 by Souper
